attributes.description: Exquisite example of the exceedingly rare 5 speed manual 280 SL. It is even more remarkable when you factor in the fact that it has only covered 77000kms, surely one of the lowest mileages available anywhere outside a museum!! Its just an absolute joy to have on my floor if for no other reason than to see the collectors fretting and ruffling each others feathers to add it to their collection. Remember they are only original once and low mileages on such a car are unusual. I currently have a handful of SL's but the rest have a more usual 200 to 250,000 kms on them. Come and have a look and you can gauge the relative values.
attributes.title: 1985 Mercedes-Benz SL 5 spd manual
